channel.title: Can't connect to my server with my client or silabsoft client!
channel.description:
I have everything up and running, everything is perfect... portforwarding and all but the problem is that i can't connect to my client, not even silabsoft, and the funny thing is that i can connect with MoparScape Client 4...
HELP PLEASE??
